alert.note: Alert for Creek (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 8:12AM CDT until May 06 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Polecat Creek near Jenks affecting Tulsa County. Polecat Creek near Sapulpa affecting Creek County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Polecat Creek near Sapulpa. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, widespread flooding affects pasturelands and oil fields between Sapulpa and the Tulsa County line. Barns and other outbuildings may be threatened by minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:37 AM CDT Friday the stage was 24.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
